name: eipw-action
description: A GitHub action to run eipw and display the results.

scripts.build: tsc --strict --noEmit && esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --outfile=dist/index.js && shx cp node_modules/eipw-lint-js/eipw_lint_js_bg.wasm dist && echo { \"type\": \"commonjs\" } > dist/package.json
